name: Spades Kings - Card Game
description:
Place your bids and work with your partner to outfox your opponent. You'll need a great combination of strategy and teamwork to win!

Spades Kings features an outstanding artificial intelligence engine. Three different difficulty levels ensure that you can play against a computer opponent that matches your skill level.

Spades Kings offers many exciting features, including:

* Great graphics and awesome sound effects
* Outstanding card animations

If you've been waiting for a killer Spades Kings app for your iPhone or iPod Touch, this is it. Download Spades Kings today and check it out!
